title: Into the Green
description: Cece's life had crumbled in the wake of a devastating breakup, leaving her adrift in a sea of uncertainty. Seeking solace in a fresh start, she moves in with a seemingly ordinary roommate, only to have her world spiral into an enchanting and perilous mystery.When her vivacious roommate mysteriously disappears, Cece refuses to listen to the police, who tell her she will likely show up in a day or two.With determination as her guiding light, she teams up with her roommate’s cocky and abrasive brother, Jasper.Together, they plunge headfirst into a world beyond imagination—one filled with mystical creatures, hidden realms, and age-old secrets.As the shadows of her own secret legacy loom, Cece discovers that her roommate and Jasper are no ordinary humans but fae—beings of unexpected power from a land shrouded in myths and legends.But as her feelings for Jasper deepen, Cece faces not only the challenge of understanding her newfound identity but also the complexities of love in a world where danger lurks around every corner…
author: Jessica Gadziala
